channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan's Military Prepares for Inauguration Ceremony With Flag Flyover
item.description: With Taiwan getting ready to inaugurate President-elect Lai Ching-te, the country’s military has been rehearsing a major flyover exercise for the day.

item.title: Chinese Coast Guard Vessels Enter Prohibited Waters Near Taiwan's Kinmen Islands
item.description: Four China Coast Guard vessels entered "prohibited waters" near Taiwan's outlying Kinmen Islands less than two weeks ahead of President-elect Lai Ching-te's inauguration.

item.title: Taiwan’s Iconic Alishan Train Makes First Journey in Wales
item.description: Taiwan’s iconic Alishan Forest train is in the U.K. for the first time. The Alishan Forest Railway has loaned the train to a light railway in eastern Wales for three years.

item.title: Taiwan's Foreign Ministry To Sue Opposition Kuomintang Lawmaker
item.description: Taiwan's foreign ministry is suing an opposition Kuomintang lawmaker for allegedly leaking confidential documents.
